casebody.data:
NATIONSTAR MORTGAGE, LLC, Plaintiff,
v.
Rodney LEE, Defendant-Movant,
and
RCL Management, Blac Wall Street, LLC, and Shimeese Posey, Defendants. M-1104 September Term 2017
080151 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification is denied.
